instruction: Based on recent market analysis, it is important to manage your portfolio exposures to the most impacted investment styles. Please provide a plan of action to adjust portfolio exposures and ensure stable performance during times of uncertainty.
output: Given recent market analysis, it is recommended to adjust portfolio exposures away from more-volatile high-beta stocks, momentum stocks that had done well over the previous 12 months, and growth-orientated equities. Instead, focus on stocks with heavy exposure to Value, Profitability and Earnings quality. It is also important to stay updated on economic recovery progress and adjust portfolio exposures accordingly. Diversification and proper risk management are key to ensuring stable performance during times of uncertainty.
